reviewText: They did a pretty nice job putting this together and it is obvious they did a lot of research.  But they missed a couple of theories of where the gold could be hidden.  For instance, there are many people who believe the gold ended up at the Mumford Estate in south Georgia.  Not a word was said about this.  Even if the theory is a little far-fetched I still think it was worth mentioning.  Overall though, I think it was interesting and worth watching.
